Serious Game ensured energy

Serious Games

Games that do not have entertainment, enjoyment or fun as their primary purpose. (Michael & Chen, 2005)


In ensured energy players manage the Swiss energy system until 2050:










 



Challenged by physical constrains & shocks
Feedback on CO2, cost, energy imports & land use
